ygData.subject: Re: Draigcanwyr
ygData.msgSnippet: You just made my day thank you very very much!!!! IF you are on Povar you have to tell me who you are so I can give you some prize :). To answer the question..
ygData.messageBody:
You just made my day thank you very very much!!!!
IF you are on Povar you have to tell me who you are so I can give you some prize :).

To answer the question.. Adon is a follower of Veeshan and I am of Welsh decent and being a Bard I figured it would indeed be a worthy and unique name. Thanks much.

Adon Draigcanwyr
----- Original Message -----
From: Susanne
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 6:16 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Draigcanwyr


It means dragon singer in Welsh. I assume that you completed some amazing task to earn it... :)
